body_html: Indeed most package managers store the dependencies on their own. Let's conditionally depend on backports.weakref in the setup.py (avoiding clutter for pip users). I'll update the PR. Thanks for your comments!
body_text: Indeed most package managers store the dependencies on their own. Let's conditionally depend on backports.weakref in the setup.py (avoiding clutter for pip users). I'll update the PR. Thanks for your comments!
body: Indeed most package managers store the dependencies on their own. Let's conditionally depend on `backports.weakref` in the `setup.py` (avoiding clutter for `pip` users). I'll update the PR. Thanks for your comments!
